location: Cremona Country Fellowship, 210 1 Avenue West Cremona, AB T0M 0R0
description: Come join us for a week of fun, games, and learning at our CCF VBS event! This in-person gathering is packed with Bible stories, crafts, music, and more. Perfect for kids looking to have a blast while growing in their faith. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to connect with other children and build lasting memories!
